introduction: Instead of planning a fixed public transport journey from origin to destination upfront, this tool shows the next best alternatives for the current transfer situation with their destination arrival distribution (currently Germany only).
interchanges_explanation: You need to enter all potential interchange stations (up to 10). Only direct connections between these stations will be found.
data_retrieval_waiting: Data retrieval can take up to one minute.
no_earlier_connections: Start of query period reached. Consider modifying the query or select a different time window to display.
no_later_connections: End of query period reached. Consider modifying the query or select a different time window to display.
error_http_400: Requested time might be too far in the future or past, or origin or destination do not exist or do not have any arrivals/departures.
error_http_502: Failed requesting timetable data. Retrieving the data might have taken too long. Try again.
error_http_503: Failed requesting timetable data. Possibly too many requests. Try again later.
error_unknown: Connection to server failed. Are you offline?
tip_0: By clicking/tapping on a connection, you basically board it, and the next best connections from the next relevant stop of that connection are shown.
tip_1: Leave the date/time unset and create a bookmark of this page in order to easily always access the current view.
tip_2: TeSpace works like a car navigation system: Only the alternatives for the next relevant step are shown, you will see later how to continue further.
tip_3: Click on the back arrow on the left in the detail view to return to the previous station.
explain_share_mean: I will arrive at {{destination}} on average at {{time}}.
explain_share_mode: My most likely time of arrival is {{time}}.
explain_share_95th: With an estimated probability of 95%, I will arrive before {{time}}.
